Description: Textile fragment; rectangle of linen cloth - fine quality. Undyed, but now dark cream in colour. Selvedge fringe of the encircling type, other edges torn or cut. Worn. The weave is plain [warp-faced simple tabby] and the threads are S-spun and S-spliced; the stitch gauge is warp c.27 ends per 10mm and weft c.15 picks per 10mm.
